transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haa ji sir good evening Preeti Rathore baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART trade office se kya haal hai aapke?
Executive: Hmm hmm okay yes I am good.
Customer: Sir actually main aapko morning mein call nahi kar payi because since morning I was in meeting continuously abhi thodi der pehle hi main free hui hu.
Customer: To abhi hum log connect kar sakte hain meeting par?
Executive: Nahi abhi connect nahi kar paunga aap jo hai so jo kuch bhi background mein karna hai you take your time and do whatever is needed to.
Customer: Achcha mujhe aap ek baat bataiye sir aapka jo website hai external website bana hua hai aapka ek kal main check kar rahi thi.
Customer: To usme se content vagera sara mil jayega vahan par matlab do you have that content vagera agar mujhe kuch vahan se reference ke liye lena ho to vo sab hai aapke paas mein available.
Executive: Haan haan haan content hai usme aur IndiaMART pe bhi bahut sara content dala hua hai product description.
Customer: Haan IndiaMART pe na lekin jaise ki kal maine aapko bataya tha ki sir bahut sara content mujhe kara ke dena hai since your brand is gladiator wala to I just want ki main jitna bhi insert kar pau is brand ko gladiator wale ko aapke keywords mein specifications mein and jo title hai keyword ka uske upar description mein to utna jyada aapko boost milega dusra aapka jo product hai isme na sabse bada jo gap which I have identified aapke keywords pe na corrections ki requirement hai jaise koi aapne ek keyword dala for reference main bata deti hu you have mentioned gladiator defender 41 safe I fireproof jewelry safe 42 inch commercial security safe.
Customer: To iska jo keyword ka jo name hai that is not the correct one usko naam kuch change karke na jaise aap usko gladiator commercial security safe dal sakte hain matlab jisse search hota hai vahi ki as a buyer koi bhi itna bada keyword nahi dalta hai vo that should be short in size to us tarike se hi hame isko rakhne ki jarurat hai aur aapke isme description mein I have seen ki maximum jagah pe content mein na it is mentioned godrej godrej godrej wala jo kal hum log discuss kar rahe the to pure description mein har jagah pe jo boost mila hua hai that is basically for godrej wala brand jo dala hua hai content mein which is again completely a wrong thing jo aapka brand hai aap usi ko promote karo jisse ki hamara kal discussion hua tha to that should be gladiator wala vo sab isliye maine bola ki sir kuch technical bhi rahega to mujhe aapse bhi discuss karna hoga kuch mere bhi insights hai jo mujhe isme formatting correct karani hai keyword name correct karane hai to uske liye mujhe sir thoda sa aapka support ki requirement lagegi.
Executive: Aapke yahan jo padhe likhe log hain jo technically cheezo ko thoda samajh sakte hain jo comprehend kar sakte hain unko kaho ki ye jo mera jo product description hai usme godrej naam likha hua hai usi jagah pe aap gladiator kar de usko thoda sa tweak kar de likhna agar achcha aata hai padhna samajhna achcha aata hai to hum shabdo ke sath khel sakte hain aur baki internet pe godrej jab aapke paas godrej hai steelege hai suraksha hai safej hai duniya jahan ki company listed hai to agar intent sahi ho to delivery khud b khud sahi ho jayegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To vo sari cheeze hai vahan pe mera vo website hai aap mujhe madam ek baat batau main ek baat batau.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main mechanical engineer with MBA finance and marketing hu theek hai 30 years of experience hai oil and gas project construction mein indian oil hindustan petroleum DRDO defense mein bahut sara kaam kiya hai to mera of course mera technical background hai jyada lekin aap mujhe biology ke kisi bhi cheez pe koi topic de do aur bolo ki aap iske upar mein ek achcha sa 10 page ka article mujhe chahiye bahut hi technical chahiye to mere andar vo guts hai ki main do din teen din research karke internet pe jitna bhi badhiya material available hai main vo padh ke aapko main bahut sundar ek jo hai so well formatted jisko bolte hain ki upar mein abstract hoga fir intro hoga fir content hoga fir conclusion hoga jo bhi hai vo ek structured way mein main bana ke de sakta hu to utna hi padhai likhai to sab karke jate hain aisa to nahi hai ki mere paas koi basic hai sir ha vahi main bol rahi thi basic hai ye sab ab jaise keyword name hai aapke website mein bilkul perfect dale hue hai jewelry safe hai product name gladiator fireproof counter safe locker single door jewelry safe gladiator defender aur prime safe to bilkul perfect keyword dale hue hai but agar main yahan baat karu kal jab maine dekha to product name hi itna zabardast dala hua hai gladiator 49 class BB defender safe gold loan safe security safe fireproof itna bada buyer kabhi search karta hi nahi hai that will be fireproof jewelry safe matlab dusra agar banayenge to gold loan safe search karega tisra keyword vo short emphasize karna padta hai ki jaise hum jaise search karte hain vaisa hi buyer bhi search karta hoga to hum itne bade naam kabhi dalte hi nahi hai we just mention generic things in the keywords to jisse search jyada hota hai to vahi hame naam rakhne ki jarurat hai aur usme sabse bada keyword name hi mujhe lagta hai ki hum log correct kar denge to bahut sara aapka aapko usi mein change dikh jayega ki traffic pe kya change aa raha hai ab uske baad content pe to corrections hai hi hai formatting mein bahut sara gadbad hai jaise formatting mein kahin pe bold mein hai kahin question mark hai kahin dots hai but vo pura correct format nahi dala hua hai to jab when you go as a buyer you also refer ki kuch dhanka dikhe image dekh rahe ho to dhanki dekhoge aap jaisa specification dekhna chah rahe ho vaisa hi dekhoge to same kind of thing get applies on ourself as well ki hum content vaisa de jaisa buyer dekhna chahta hai ki har cheez short emphasize honi chahiye ki relevant information sari mil rahi hai formatting theek hai images theek hai matlab vaisa type aur keyword theek hai to ye sab cheeze maine isliye bola tha ki sir mujhe kal aapse meeting karni hogi taki ye sab main correct kara saku.
Executive: Main purposely aapke sath nahi kar raha hu meeting main aapke sath isliye nahi kar raha hu ki dekho aapko jo karna hai karo I have paid you ye purpose ye hai ki I was waiting today for 11 am but you did not think it right even to drop a single message ki I am stuck with my meetings and other things internal meeting so internal meetings are more important for your company than a customer a customer does not need to how a customer is treated at your this organization this is a prime example to isliye main nahi kar raha hu aapko jo karna hai kijiye aur dusri baat before you start before you start ek aur mera ye hai jab aap kaam shuru karengi to 10% execution mein lagna chahiye aur 90% jo hai so planning mein time lagna chahiye to aap jab plan karke kaam karne ja rahi hai to it's my recommendation not suggestion it's a highly strong recommendation that you first get in touch with your SEO team the team that works on google SEO and other things to rank these listings on top.
Executive: To usme unse pucho ki headings pe kaam hota hai ya description pe kaam hota hai kaun se keyword ka placement kahan pe rakhne se jo hai so ye search engine mein upar jata hai to I have seen gladiator prime safe lockers prime mat dalo aur mat dalo sirf gladiator dalo in raipur in mumbai dala to to vo karta hai kyuki dekhiye ye main isliye bata raha hu ki 6 saal se main bhi ye sab kar raha hu aur mera aap bhi aapne dekh liya hai ki mera apna website bhi hai trade india bhi chala raha hu just dial bhi chala raha hu amazon par bhi chhote home lockers chala raha hu to ha to vo thodi thodi cheeze jab jarurat padti hai to seekhna hota hai to isliye aap ek baar unse baat karke kaise kya best hai vo aap karo dekho and main apne end se isko thoda bahut kara ke corrections aapko pehle dikha deti hu ki ye corrections kiye hai agar vo proceed karte hai to main sara kaam kara ke de deti hu fir aapko theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai ha okay all right ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs support for formatting and keyword correction.

- Website content mentions competitor brand Godrej.

- Current product names are too long.

- Formatting issues in content (bold, question marks).

- Internal meetings prioritized over customer meetings.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested contacting SEO team for keyword placement.

- Executive shared his technical and marketing experience.

- Executive explained how to improve product descriptions.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will make corrections and show executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- keywords, formatting, product description, seo, website
